bro its no problem  if u do entourage in 720 or 576...only size is the issue..if u can compress in 140 mb size/episode approx..ie for 30 minutes episode..it will do..i only want to say 480 is lower limit..upper limit  can be anywhere untill size is not big issue that 2 gigs
thank you :)
generally a 20 min episode can b compressed pretty wel as a 720p rip in 150mb...i'll to do it in 720p at as lower size as possible...
